job.title: Software Engineer, Apple Pay
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtImagine what you could do here At Apple new ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products services and customer experiences very quickly You bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplish   ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtWe provide the machine learning infrastructure data products and algorithms supporting some of Apples newest and fastest growing services Going beyond accuracy we are driven to develop fair explainable algorithms that preserve user privacy Machine Learning solutions at Apple require rigorous data engineering we always launch at scaleltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgt3 years proficient experience programming in an enterprise language CC Java Go etcltbrgtltbrgt3 years experience in another language suited to machine learning R Python Scala etcltbrgtltbrgt3 years experience with big data environments and tools Hadoop Spark Jupyter Notebook etcltbrgtltbrgt2 years experience crafting and implementing data product pipelines at scaleltbrgtltbrgt2 years experience with a variety of machine learning  deep learning libraries TensorFlow Scikitlearn etc and data visualization libraries MatPlotLib D3js etcltbrgtltbrgtWorking knowledge of governancesecurity concepts and technologies including encryption anonymization PCI PII HIPAA etcltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtWe are looking for candidates with broad experience from system integration developing data pipelines and data governance through to model training deployment and monitoring in production We are especially interested in proven ability to solve problems continuous learning and digging deep into the domain when necessary We want to collaborate with team members that have a balance of theory and practice  ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtJob duties include the following  ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtMultifunctional collaboration during data discovery review of data specifications and identification of data with potential to improve machine learning services   ltbrgtltbrgtScoping design and implementation of reliable system integrations for data acquisition   ltbrgtltbrgtData cleaning feature development and data product governance   ltbrgtltbrgtFull lifecycle analytic model ownership including model selection training evaluation deployment and maintenanceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBS or MS in Computer Science or related technical field equivalent work experience will be consideredltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtRole Number 200289743ltbrgtltbrgt
